title: Is Fallout 4 worth it?
body:
http://www.giantfreakinrobot.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/01/Fallout.jpg
I have never played a fallout game before but I love playing action games
RPG games, mystery games
and other type of games depending on my mood

Anyone here played fallout?
Think the game is worth the buy?

Should I know something of the fallout lore or is that not needed?
Anyone here bought the game?

BTW just 4 more days before they will be releasing this game!! mehehehehehe
